mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(USER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, EXPER_NO, COUNT) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{productNo}, #{experNo}, #{count})
mapper.select: SELECT C.USER_NO, P.PRODUCT_NO, B.BOOTH_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, C.COUNT, P.PRODUCT_IMG_FP FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON (P.PRODUCT_NO=C.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN BOOTH B ON (B.BOOTH_NO=p.BOOTH_NO) WHERE USER_NO= #{userNo}

SELECT C.USER_NO,C.EXPER_NO, B.BOOTH_NAME, E.EXPER_TITLE, E.EXPER_PRICE, C.COUNT, E.EXPER_IMG_FP FROM CART C JOIN EXPERIENCE E ON(E.EXPER_NO=C.EXPER_NO) JOIN BOOTH B ON (B.BOOTH_NO=E.BOOTH_NO) WHERE USER_NO= #{userNo}
